text: The FLASH NTD-Lsm11 NTD complex showed a shift in its sedimentation coefficient value from 1.36 to 3.2 with increasing concentration of the complex (Table 3 , Fig 6D) . This observation indicates that the dissociation and association of the complex is a rapid event [30] and the exact molar mass of the complex cannot be accurately estimated. The broad range of observed molecular weight by AUC (17.8 to 49.7 kDa, Table 3 ) is similar to that seen in the SEC-MALS experiment. Nevertheless, we were able to obtain a K d value of 2.4 Î¼M for the complex (Table 3) .
